articles.description: Wix.com (WIX) shares rose more than 2.5% in pre-market trading on Thursday as Raymond James upgraded the web development company. Read for more.
articles.content:
Wix.com (NASDAQ:WIX) shares rose more than 2.5% in pre-market trading on Thursday as Raymond James upgraded the web development company a day after shares fell more than 10% on no company specific news.

articles.title: Wix.com rises, GoDaddy slips as Morgan Stanley changes ratings on pair
articles.description: Wix.com (WIX) stock rose in early trading on Tuesday while GoDaddy (GDDY) fell as Piper Sandler changed its ratings on the web development companies. Read for more.
articles.content:
Wix.com (NASDAQ:WIX) stock rose in early trading on Tuesday while GoDaddy (NYSE:GDDY) fell as Piper Sandler changed its ratings on the web development companies, as the firm is now more geared towards growth than value.

articles.description: The report suggests that tier three cities recorded the highest interest to opt for Web Development and Python courses. Rs 50,000 was the highest monthly salary of candidates after completing these online courses.
